column2: Woad Paint is made and applied by druids and truthsayers. It binds excess winds of magic and protects the wearer from some of the physical attacks. If an area is saturated with unused magic, the protection provided will be more efficient.
Having mastered their temper, they no longer suffer from the mood swings so common in the warbands of Albion, allowing them to utilize their war fury without any drawbacks.
As long as they aren't too injured or weakened, the charge of this unit will be savage, uncompromising and simply devastating.
Even if the body is broken, Highlanders will attempt to fight on for some seconds, forcing their body to keep on moving by sheer willpower alone.
